div3.p: polla/kis e)qau/masa ti/si pote\ lo/gois *)aqhnai/ous e)/peisan oi( graya/menoi *swkra/thn w(s a)/cios ei)/h qana/tou th=| po/lei. h( me\n ga\r grafh\ kat' au)tou= toia/de tis h)=n: a)dikei= *swkra/ths ou(\s me\n h( po/lis nomi/zei qeou\s ou) nomi/zwn, e(/tera de\ kaina\ daimo/nia ei)sfe/rwn: a)dikei= de\ kai\ tou\s ne/ous diafqei/rwn.

prw=ton me
 ou)=n, w(s ou)k e)no/mizen ou(\s h( po/lis nomi/zei qeou/s, poi/w| pot' e)xrh/santo tekmhri/w|; qu/wn te ga fanero\s h)=n polla/kis me

a)ll' oi( me

kai/toi ti/s ou)k a)
 o(mologh/seien au)to

ta\ me\n ga\r a)nagkai=a sunebou/leue kai\ pra/ttein w(s e)no/mizen a)/rist' a)\n praxqh=nai: peri\ de\ tw=n a)dh/lwn o(/pws a)pobh/soito manteusome/nous e)/pempen, ei) poihte/a.
